about.description:
I constantly wonder how to improve our present, to make our future better, particularly thanks to the advancements in computer science.

My priority is to craft intuitive user experiences (UX), that meet the needs of the users in the most efficient way possible.
about.title: About

cnam.institution: Conservatoire National des Arts et Métiers (CNAM), in Eckbolsheim - UIMM Alsace - ITII Alsace
cnam.study-type: Engineer in Computer Science and Information Systems (IS)

iut.study-type: University Bachelor of Technology (BUT) Computer Science

courses.systems-c: Systems programming in C (Memory allocation, Pointers, Structures)
courses.windows-forms: Windows Forms (.NET Framework) Application Development in C#

courses.clean-code: Design Patterns and Principles (Maintainable and Reusable Code) in UML
courses.systems-c: Systems programming in C (Multi-Thread, Server/Client UDP/TCP)
courses.web: Web development with the Laravel framework in PHP

courses.complexity-algorithms: Theoretical and Practical Algorithmic Complexity in C++
courses.web: Web development in Node.js and React.js

lycee.institution: Heinrich Nessel High School in Haguenau

interests.fusey: <link>Fusey (fusey.gg)</link>: website I'm developing for the game ARK that tracks the number of players connected to the servers in real time and has over ~5,000 visitors each month, ~100,000 members on Discord, and ~120,000 followers on X/Twitter.

ircad.summary: Development of WebSurg, a virtual university dedicated to medical-surgical training, in React.js/Next.js and API Platform with Symfony.

numerize.summary: Development of an DMS (Document Management System) tool in React.js, Laravel and GraphQL.

about.description: I constantly wonder how to improve our present, to make our future better, particularly thanks to the advancements in computer science.

code.description:
My priority is to craft intuitive user experiences (UX), that meet the needs of the users in the most efficient way possible.

Mainly focused on the development of Web solutions.

I am also interested in mobile and desktop application development, among other areas within the field of computer science.
code.title: Developer Full Stack
